message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand that $900000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $925000. I believe this is a fair price that balances the value of the product with your budget. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value I believe the product will bring to me.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the minimum value I'm willing to accept for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum. I'm counteroffering at $920000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to pay $885000 for the product. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value I believe the product will bring to me, and it's still a good deal for you.

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob. However, I'm starting to feel that we're getting too close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to the value the product has for you. I'm counteroffering at $915000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I'm putting into this negotiation.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value I believe the product will bring to me, and it's still a good deal for you. However, if we can't meet at this price, I may have to consider buying the product from another seller who is willing to sell it to me for $1000000.
